{ "rules": { "parameter-default-not-allowed-oas3":{ "description": "A required parameter should not specify a default value.", "severity": "warn", "given": ["$.paths[*].parameters.[?(@.required)]","$.paths.*[get,put,post,patch,delete,options,head].parameters.[?(@.required)]"], "then": {"field":"default","function":"falsy"} } } }
